. It is a very old city and has had a strong tradition of mining, till reent times when most mines have been closed. It is the birth place of the famous sculpture Constantin Brancusi and some of his earliest works can be admired here.

value: content=The beautiful park with some of Constantin Brâncuși's sculptures.

Around the park there are several places where you can eat.
In the park you can have a drink.

value: content=Reasonably priced option very close to the centre of town. The outside looks a little forboding - as does the dusty lobby with its discarded and unused furniture, but the rooms are clean and bright.
